title: DynamoDB Stream to Step Functions
description: Invoke Step Functions workflow from a DynamoDB stream message

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to invoke an AWS Step Functions state machine from DynamoDB Stream without using Lambda.
This pattern deploys one Step Function, one DynamoDB with stream enabled and one EventBridge Pipe.

bullets.text: Amazon EventBridge Pipes - connects sources to targets. Pipes are intended for point-to-point integrations between supported sources and targets, with support for advanced transformations and enrichment.

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
